pages.title: Liquid Mud
pages.text: Mud. It is wet mud. Not particularly interesting in itself. What is practical is the collision of the mud with other liquids, like $(thing)Water$() or $(thing)Lava$(). This creates $(thing)Dirt$() or $(thing)Coarse Dirt$(), respectively.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)While a mud bath sounds like wellness, it is not advised.
